page.title: 11 Proj 4. H.M.S. Raleigh
page.content: {H.M.S Raleigh} If you want to join the Royal Navy there are only 2 places you can join. If you go in as an officer entrant you join at Dartmouth. Everyone else who joins the Royal Navy enters through H.M.S Raleigh in Torpoint. H.M.S Raleigh was founded in 1939. There were five sea going ships to bear the name Raleigh before this shore base was founded. H.M.S Raleigh has the basic training course for new entrants(naval ratings) ,W.R.N.S.,Queen Alexandra's Nursing Services and Artificers, who are going to be the navy's technical specialists ,do their first terms training at H.M.S. Raleigh. H.M.S. Raleigh also has command schools for fire fighting,seamanship and first aid.This means that training _]
